resources: Quote of the day Next Problem with internet quotes is that you can\'t always depend on their accuracy. Abraham Lincoln Age is not important unless you\'re a cheese. Helen Hayes It always seems impossible until it\'s done. Nelson Mandela Abraham Lincoln was the 16th U.S. President and died over 100 years before the internet existed. Helen Hayes won an Emmy, a Grammy, an Oscar, and a Tony award. Nelson Mandela was South Africa\'s first democratically elected president. Fact missing Inspirational image of mountains or kittens and such. //Homework Quotes You cannot always see the light at the end of a tunnel but if you just keep moving, you will come to a better place Uncle Iroh from Avatar: The Last Airbender (Voiced by Mako Iwamatsu) Part of the reason why Iroh is silent throughout most of Season 3 of The Last Airbender was because the crew was still looking for a new voice actor while filming due to Mako unfortunately passing away from cancer after the crew finished filming season 2. Everybody always figures the time they live in is the most epic, most important age to end all ages. But tyrants and heroes rise and fall, and historians sort out the pieces Jolee Bindo from Star Wars Knights of the Old Republic (Voiced by Kevin Michael Richardson) Jolee Bindo lived 3956 BBY (Before the Battle of Yavin) and was neither a Sith nor a Jedi. Despite most of his teachings being lost by the time of Return of the Jedi his teachings of knowing both sides of the force and attachments ultimately being what saved you from the Dark Side would end up being the key tenets of Luke Skywalker's New Jedi Order.
